common.name: Name

password.label: Password
password.length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.special-character: Password must contain at least one special character

file.title: Select a file
file.description: Drag & drop or click to select a file.

common.consent: I agree to the terms and conditions

toast.token-expired: Your session has expired, please login again

meta.title: Edit Profile – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Update your username and profile picture easily on Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit. Manage your personal information securely.
meta.keywords: edit profile, update username, change profile picture, user settings, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Reset Password – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link. The email field is prefilled if you are logged in.
meta.keywords: reset password, password recovery, forgot password, password reset email, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Password Reset Confirmation – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Confirm your password reset by clicking the link sent to your email. Securely update your password and regain access to your account.
meta.keywords: password reset confirmation, reset password, email verification, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Welcome to Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit – Your Full-Stack Starter Solution
meta.description: Get started quickly with Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit, a powerful full-stack starter template combining Adonis backend and Svelte frontend. Build your projects faster and smarter.
meta.keywords: Adonis starter kit, Svelte starter kit, full-stack template, web development, backend, frontend, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Login – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Log in to Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit using your email and password, or quickly via Google, GitHub, or Discord OAuth.
meta.keywords: login, sign in, email login, password login, OAuth login, Google login, GitHub login, Discord login, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Create Your Account – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Sign up for Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit by creating your account with username, email, and password. Or quickly register using Google, Discord, or GitHub.
meta.keywords: create account, sign up, register, username, email, password, OAuth, Google login, Discord login, GitHub login, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Confirm Logout – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Are you sure you want to log out? Confirm your logout to end your session safely on Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit.
meta.keywords: confirm logout, logout confirmation, end session, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

modal.title: Logout
modal.text: Are you sure you want to logout ?

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.subtitle: You are not authorized to view this page.

meta.title: Unauthorized Access – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Your credentials do not grant access to this page. Please log in or contact support if you think this is a mistake.
meta.keywords: unauthorized access, 401 error, login required, permission denied, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.subtitle: You have to be logged to access this app's part.

meta.title: Access Forbidden – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: You do not have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
meta.keywords: access forbidden, 403 error, permission denied, restricted access, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Page Not Found – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Check the URL or return to the homepage of Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit.
meta.keywords: 404 error, page not found, missing page, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Already Logged In – Return to Your Dashboard | Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: You're already logged in to Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit. Continue to your dashboard or return to the homepage to explore more features.
meta.keywords: already logged in, user session, dashboard, homepage, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Unknown Error – Something Went Wrong | Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: An unexpected error occurred while using the Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit. Please try again later or return to the homepage for support.
meta.keywords: unknown error, unexpected issue, error handling, troubleshooting, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Social Hub – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Access your social dashboard: manage your friends, blocked users, and profile settings from one place.
meta.keywords: social hub, manage friends, blocked users, user profile, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

meta.title: Manage Your Friends – Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Add, remove, accept friend requests, and block users easily with Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit. Manage your social connections seamlessly.
meta.keywords: manage friends, add friends, remove friends, friend requests, block users, social management, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

modal.title: Remove a friend
modal.text: {username} will be removed from your friends

meta.title: Blocked Users - Manage Your Block List | Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit
meta.description: Easily view and manage the users you've blocked on Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit. Take control of your social connections and ensure a safer experience.
meta.keywords: blocked users, block list, manage blocked users, social settings, privacy control, Adonis & Svelte Starter Kit

match.countPlural=zero: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.
match.countPlural=one: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the user and all related data.
match.countPlural=other: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.

match.countPlural=zero: Are you sure you want to delete {languages} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the languages and all related data.
match.countPlural=one: Are you sure you want to delete {languages} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the language and all related data.
match.countPlural=other: Are you sure you want to delete {languages} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the languages and all related data.

flag.title: Flag
flag.description: Language flag (SVG format width="24" height="24" viewBox="0 0 36 36" recommended)
